Uses of Class
bridge.toolkit.ResourceMapException

Packages that use ResourceMapException
bridge.toolkit.commands   
 

Uses of ResourceMapException in bridge.toolkit.commands
 

Methods in bridge.toolkit.commands that throw ResourceMapException
private static void PreProcess.addResources(org.jdom.Document urn_map)
          Adds 'resource' elements to the imsmanifest.xml file for every file found in the resource package that is provided.
private static org.jdom.Document PreProcess.getResourceHref(java.lang.String sco_key, java.lang.String str_current)
          Finds the file that is referenced in a 'href' attribute associated with a given 'resource' element in imsmanifest.xml file.
private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> PreProcess.mapDependencies()
          Walks through the 'resource' elements in the imsmanifest.xml file (that were generated from the 'scoEntry' elements in the SCPM) and creates a map using the 'identifier' attribute of each 'resource' element as the key and a list of all of the 'identifierref' attributes of the 'dependency' child elements for that 'resource' element as the value.
private static void PreProcess.processDeps(java.util.Map sco_map)
          Walks through all of the 'dependency' elements for each SCO 'resource' element in the imsmanifest.xml file and searches for referenced media (ICN) files and referenced data modules (DMC) files.
